column5: Ive never been and was invited and I cant go for opener.I dont want to know about hot spots.I will be going up shortly after and bringig my daughters up as well for camping.We will also adventure out to alq as well.I will bring my 20ft bow rider and a 12ft canoe.Any suggestions for a place to camp and fish the shore at night before a camp fire in that area.I want to target pickerel, shoreline fishing would be great for the girls.I want to make it another adventure as always with my girls.Thanks in advance.Vince
Pm Me Vinnie and I'll tell you everything you need to know.  Might even join you for an evening fish. You will definitely get a good snack for the camp fire.
